avg-profit.tooltip: Avg. profit – is the average profit for the period in relation to the starting balance.

available-to-invest.tooltip: Available to invest - is the number of manager's tokens which are available to purchase.

trades.tooltip: Trades show the number of financial operations conducted by the manager.

investors.tooltip: Investor - is a Genesis Vision client, investors choose a manager in the Program Ratings and invest money in their investment programs.

program-item-balance.tooltip: Balance – is the amount of funds on a trading account.

total-profit.tooltip: Total profit - is the all-time total manager’s profit.

balance.tooltip: Balance - is the total USD value of funds that are managed in the investment program.

own-balance.tooltip: Own balance - is an amount of money which belongs to the manager.

period-duration.tooltip: Period duration - is a period that is defined by a manager at the end of which all trading positions are closed with a subsequent profit distribution.

success-fee.tooltip: Success fee is an additional successful trading fee that is charged from the investor’s profit at the end of the reporting period.

managers-fee.tooltip: Manager’s fee - is an obligatory annual fee, charged at the end of the reporting period from the total amount of funds invested in this investment program.

symbol.tooltip: Symbol is a trading instrument which was used by a manager in a trade.

volume.tooltip: Volume is the number of units offered for sale or purchase. Usually, volume measured in "lots" - the number of currency units you will buy or sell.

ticket.tooltip: Ticket is a unique trade id.

price.tooltip: Price is a price of base trading instrument unit the value of quoted currency (in case of a currency pair).

price-open.tooltip: Price open – is a price which was at the opening moment of the trade.

price-close.tooltip: Price close – is a price which was at the closing moment of the trade.

profit.tooltip: Profit is a profit which gets from the particular trade.

direction.tooltip: Direction is an indicator of the direction of the trade (i.e. "Buy" or "Sell").

date.tooltip: Date - is a date of the trade.

date-open.tooltip: Date open – is a date when the trade was opened.

date-close.tooltip: Date close – is a date when the trade was closed.

entry.tooltip: Entry is a status of the trade (i.e. “Out” or “In”).

funds.tooltip: Funds – is the amount of money which is managed by the trader.

investors.tooltip: Investors show the amount of investors who invested in the manager.

end-of-next-period.tooltip: End of next period shows the amount of days until the end of the nearest next trading period.

profit.tooltip: Profit is the total manager’s profit.

my-profit.tooltip: My profit is the total profit earned by all programs.
